title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, February 29, 2020
description: “I’ve never read a political poem that’s accomplished anything. Poetry makes things happen, but rarely what the poet wants.” -Howard Nemerov, born this day in 1920.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “I’ve never read a political poem that’s accomplished anything. Poetry makes things happen, but rarely what the poet wants.” -Howard Nemerov, born this day in 1920.
